EmailTemplate.description: Used to notify a prospect when the lead is converted from a web to lead to loan.
EmailTemplate.name: Lead - New Web to Lead
EmailTemplate.subject: *** Thank You for Inquiring ***
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Today}
Dear {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName},
I can use correspondence like this to thank my prospect for their recent inquiries, set service level expectations, and provide them immediate confirmation of our receipt of their inquiry.
Thanks,
nCino Admin
